text: Penns Grove is a borough in Salem County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 United States Census, the borough's population was 4,837. It is near the Delaware River. According to the United States Census Bureau, the borough had a total area of 0.89 square miles (2.31 km2), all land. ==References== Category:Boroughs in New Jersey
title: Penns Grove, New Jersey
